title: Carol Kirkwood Says Goodbye to BBC After 25 Years
summary: Carol Kirkwood is a weather presenter on BBC Breakfast. She announced she is leaving the BBC after more than 25 years. She told her friends on TV that it was hard to say goodbye because she loves her job. Carol is 63 years old and will leave in April. She wants to spend more time with her husband Steve and go traveling. Carol joined the BBC in 1998 and has been a friendly face on TV, giving weather updates to millions of people. She has worked on BBC Breakfast since 2010 and has presented from places like Wimbledon. Carol has won awards for being a great weather presenter. She started her career as a helper on the show.

background_read: Carol Kirkwood is a well-known weather presenter on BBC Breakfast, a popular morning TV show in the UK. She has been working at the BBC since 1998, helping people know the weather every day. Many viewers trust her because she is friendly and has been on TV for a long time. Carol also likes to travel and spend time with her family. She has done other fun things on TV, like dancing on a show called Strictly Come Dancing. This article talks about her decision to leave her job to enjoy more time with her husband.
